body:
> I'm not sure the --update-actions flag is working with npm run start. I rebased this over my implement-action-forms branch and wasn't seeing updates to action schemas unless I ran manage.py update_actions

I'll test it locally again, but did you restart webpack after rebasing? It needs to pick up a new plugin to run the command automatically.
